Process.Def: The “Empathization” process must help to discover and understand the users
Activities.Def: The “observe” activity must look at the context and environment to collect as much data as possible.
Tasks.Def: The “communicate” task must provide information on the context, the problem encountered

Process.Def: The “Empathization” process must help to discover and understand the users
Activities.Def: The “observe” activity must look at the context and environment to collect as much data as possible.
Tasks.Def: The “Search/understanding the problem” task must assist in the reflection and use of concepts to address the problem in an appropriate manner.

Process.Def: The “Empathization” process must help to discover and understand the users
Activities.Def: The “Identify” activity must recognize the characteristics of a problem
Tasks: Analyse conscious and unconscious user needs
Tasks.Def: The “Analyse conscious and unconscious user needs” task must allow for the understanding of all user needs

Process.Def: The “Empathization” process must help to discover and understand the users
Activities.Def: The “Identify” activity must recognize the characteristics of a problem
Tasks.Def: The “Identify designing constraints” task must highlight the design constraints to be considered to solve the problem.

Process.Def: The “Project definition” process must interpret the collecting data and delimitate the scope of the project and refine it
Activities.Def: The “Define a scope” activity must elaborate a detailed description of the project
Tasks.Def: The “Concert with the involved stakeholders” task must allow the exchange between all stakeholders involved in the project

Process.Def: The “Project definition” process must interpret the collecting data and delimitate the scope of the project and refine it
Activities.Def: The “Define a scope” activity must elaborate a detailed description of the project
Tasks.Def: The “Formulate a point of view” task must help to prioritize user needs

Process.Def: The “Project definition” process must interpret the collecting data and delimitate the scope of the project and refine it
Activities.Def: The “Stabilize a shared vision” task must allow to fix the set the project
Tasks.Def: The “Confront requirements, needs and constraints” task must formulate the continuation of the project

Process.Def: The “Project definition” process must interpret the collecting data and delimitate the scope of the project and refine it
Activities.Def: The “Stabilize a shared vision” task must allow to fix the set the project
Tasks.Def: The “Hypothesize” tasks must propose potential functionalities and properties of the future product

Process.Def: The “ideation” process must produce, develop and communicate new ideas and solutions
Activities.Def: The “Generate ideas” activity must produce, develop and communicate new ideas
Tasks.Def: The “Brainstorm” task must allow a formalised, collective and creative solution to the problem identified

Process.Def: The “ideation” process must produce, develop and communicate new ideas and solutions
Activities.Def: The “Generate ideas” activity must produce, develop and communicate new ideas
Tasks.Def: The “Organize and pool ideas” tasks must help to class and select the suitable idea

Process.Def: The “ideation” process must produce, develop and communicate new ideas and solutions
Activities.Def: The “Identify opportunities” activity must produce, develop and communicate new solutions
Tasks.Def: The “Generate solutions” task must propose solutions to turn ideas into reality

Process.Def: The “ideation” process must produce, develop and communicate new ideas and solutions
Activities.Def: The “Identify opportunities” activity must produce, develop and communicate new solutions
Tasks.Def: The “Validate and decide” task must select the solutions chosen by the user

Process.Def: The "Modelling" process must allow the solution to be presented in the form of a formal model.
Activities: Choose technical, aesthetic and economic options
Activities.Def: The “Choose technical, aesthetic and economic options” activity must help to determine the options of the product
Tasks: Examine the functionalities of the product
Tasks.Def: The “Examine the functionalities of the product” task must help to define if the solutions meet the expected results

Process.Def: The "Modelling" process must allow the solution to be presented in the form of a formal model.
Activities: Choose technical, aesthetic and economic options
Activities.Def: The “Choose technical, aesthetic and economic options” activity must help to determine the options of the product
Tasks.Def: The “Select materials” task must allow to choose the suitable materials (according to the demand of the user) to use for the modelling

Process.Def: The "Modelling" process must allow the solution to be presented in the form of a formal model.
Activities.Def: The “Present a model/mock-up” task must allow the realization of a model of the selected solution
Tasks.Def: The “Draw the preliminary drafts” task must allow to establish model of the chosen solutions

Process.Def: The "Modelling" process must allow the solution to be presented in the form of a formal model.
Activities.Def: The “Present a model/mock-up” task must allow the realization of a model of the selected solution
Tasks.Def: The “Validate with the users” task must allow the validation of the models by the users

Process.Def: The “Prototyping” process allow the solution to be presented in the form of a physical element
Activities.Def: The “Implement the prototype” activity must allow the elaboration of the prototype
Tasks.Def: The “Select materials” task must allow to choose the suitable materials (according to the demand of the user) to use for the prototyping

Process.Def: The “Prototyping” process allow the solution to be presented in the form of a physical element
Activities.Def: The “Implement the prototype” activity must allow the elaboration of the prototype
Tasks.Def: The “Launch the prototype elaboration” task must allow to get the prototype of the favoured solution

Process.Def: The “Prototyping” process allow the solution to be presented in the form of a physical element
Activities.Def: The “Make technical tests” activity must allow to test the obtained prototype
Tasks.Def: The “Inspect the resulting prototype” task must an evaluation of the prototype functioning

Process.Def: The “Prototyping” process allow the solution to be presented in the form of a physical element
Activities.Def: The “Make technical tests” activity must allow to test the obtained prototype
Tasks.Def: The “Determine corrective actions” task must improve the prototype

Process.Def: The “Validation” process must lead to validate the project and prepare it for industrialization
Activities.Def: The “Validate the product specification” activity must allow to validate that the product specification fits with the user’s needs
Tasks: Use the product in real-life situation
Tasks.Def: The “Use the product in real-life situation” task must allow to visualize the functioning of the product in a specific context

Process.Def: The “Validation” process must lead to validate the project and prepare it for industrialization
Activities.Def: The “Validate the product specification” activity must allow to validate that the product specification fits with the user’s needs
Tasks: Validate the successful functioning of the product
Tasks.Def: The “Validate the successful functioning of the product” task must inform the suitable functioning of the product in a specific user

Process.Def: The “Validation” process must lead to validate the project and prepare it for industrialization
Activities.Def: The “Define the marketing approach” activity must determine the marketing strategy to implement concerning the product
Tasks.Def: The “Realize a market study” task must indicate the market needs for this type of product

Process.Def: The “Validation” process must lead to validate the project and prepare it for industrialization
Activities.Def: The “Define the marketing approach” activity must determine the marketing strategy to implement concerning the product
Tasks.Def: The “Define a marketing strategy” task must define if a mass customization strategy can be implemented

Process.Def: The “Validation” process must lead to validate the project and prepare it for industrialization
Activities.Def: The “Define the mass customization process” activity must to determine the conditions of the mass-customization
Tasks: Configure the product or part of the product pre-purchase
Tasks.Def: The “Configure the product or part of the product pre-purchase” task must allow the user to realize his own configuration under constraint or to customize his product by choosing the colours, textures or packaging

Process.Def: The “Validation” process must lead to validate the project and prepare it for industrialization
Activities.Def: The “Define the mass customization process” activity must to determine the conditions of the mass-customization
Tasks: Customize a part of the product after purchase
Tasks.Def: The “Customize a part of the product after purchase” task must provide the consumer with the means to carry out the personalisation himself

Process.Def: The “Validation” process must lead to validate the project and prepare it for industrialization
Activities: Elaborate and transmit the production order
Activities.Def: The “Elaborate and transmit the production order” activity must allow the product industrialization launch
Tasks.Def: The “Elaborate the production order” task must define the conditions allow the industrialization of the product

Process.Def: The “Validation” process must lead to validate the project and prepare it for industrialization
Activities: Elaborate and transmit the production order
Activities.Def: The “Elaborate and transmit the production order” activity must allow the product industrialization launch
Tasks.Def: The “Pay the product” task must characterize the industrialization launch of the product

Process.Def: The “Validation” process must lead to validate the project and prepare it for industrialization
Activities: Elaborate and transmit the production order
Activities.Def: The “Elaborate and transmit the production order” activity must allow the product industrialization launch
Tasks.Def: The “Transmit the production order” task must transfer the customized production order to the suitable manufacturer

Process.Def: The " Order reception " process must inform a stakeholder of the production launch of a product
Activities.Def: The “Receive the order” activity must characterize the transfer of an order from one stakeholder to another

Process.Def: The " Order reception " process must inform a stakeholder of the production launch of a product
Activities: Check the conformity of the order
Activities.Def: The "Check the conformity of the order" activity must allow to validate that the manufacturing order is adapted to the activities carried out by the company.

Process.Def: The “Production management” process must plan and start production
Activities: Plan the production according to flow, deadline, supply
Activities.Def: The “Plan the production” activity must organise production considering product flows, deadlines and supplies

Process.Def: The “Production management” process must plan and start production
Activities.Def: The “Analyse production activity data” activity must specify the availability of material and human resources

Process.Def: The “Production management” process must plan and start production
Activities: Define the modality of the product industrialization
Activities.Def: The “Define the modality of the product industrialization” activity must define the production process.

Process.Def: The “Production management” process must plan and start production
Activities: Check the conformity of the product
Activities.Def: The “Check the conformity of the product” activity must allow to validate that the production methods meet the requirements of the product

Process.Def: The “Production management” process must plan and start production
Activities.Def: The “Provide a technical assistance” activity must allow to fit the product specification with industrialization process requirements

Process.Def: The “Purchase” process must allow the purchase of the product or a part/component of the product
Activities.Def: The “Define supply needs” activity must allow to estimate the quantity of products, components, raw materials or packaging to purchase

Process.Def: The “Purchase” process must allow the purchase of the product or a part/component of the product
Activities.Def: The “Identify suppliers” activity must allow to find suppliers able to provide components, raw materials or packaging according to the specifications

Process.Def: The “Purchase” process must allow the purchase of the product or a part/component of the product
Activities.Def: The “Make a call for tenders” activity must allow to put suppliers in competition to provide a product/service

Process.Def: The “Purchase” process must allow the purchase of the product or a part/component of the product
Activities.Def: The “Draw up a specification” must lead to an accurate demand of supply needs (quantity, delays, materials, origin…)

Process.Def: The “Purchase” process must allow the purchase of the product or a part/component of the product
Activities: Analyse the answer to the call for tenders
Activities.Def: The “Analyse the answer to the call for tenders” activity must allow receipt of proposals from suppliers

Process.Def: The “Purchase” process must allow the purchase of the product or a part/component of the product
Activities.Def: The “Evaluate and choose the supplier” activity must help the manufacturer to choose the suitable supplier from economic, industrial, environmental and social points of view

Process.Def: The “Purchase” process must allow the purchase of the product or a part/component of the product
Activities.Def: The “Negotiate price and contract” activity must enable stakeholders to reach an agreement and determine the commercial terms of their contract

Process.Def: The “Purchase” process must allow the purchase of the product or a part/component of the product
Activities.Def: The “Trigger the order” activity must validate the order launch according to the established specification and the contract

Process.Def: The “Purchase” process must allow the purchase of the product or a part/component of the product
Activities.Def: The “Track and monitor the order” activity must allow the traceability of the order

Process.Def: The “Manufacturing” process must allow the product to be obtained by the processing of material
Activities: Check the feasibility of the specification
Activities.Def: The “Check the feasibility of the specification” activity must validate that the specification fits with the manufacturing process

Process.Def: The “Manufacturing” process must allow the product to be obtained by the processing of material
Activities.Def: The “Provide a technical assistance” activity must allow to fit the product specification with industrialization process requirements

Process.Def: The “Manufacturing” process must allow the product to be obtained by the processing of material
Activities: Identify the manufacturing, assembly operations from the instructions (drawings, bill of material…)
Activities.Def: The “Identify the manufacturing operations” activity must allow to choose the suitable manufacturing and assembly operations from the instructions (drawings, bill of material...)

Process.Def: The “Manufacturing” process must allow the product to be obtained by the processing of material
Activities: Select materials and components for manufacturing
Activities.Def: The “Select materials and components for manufacturing” activity must define the suitable amount of quantity or raw materials

Process.Def: The “Manufacturing” process must allow the product to be obtained by the processing of material
Activities: Build up the stock of raw materials and components
Activities.Def: The “Build up the stock of raw materials and components” activity must prepare the quantity of materials required for the manufacturing

Process.Def: The “Manufacturing” process must allow the product to be obtained by the processing of material
Activities.Def: The “Manufacture the product/component” activity must lead to the desired product

Process.Def: The “Manufacturing” process must allow the product to be obtained by the processing of material
Activities: Carry out the finishes of a work
Activities.Def: The “Carry out the finishes of a work” activity must refine the product obtained

Process.Def: The “Manufacturing” process must allow the product to be obtained by the processing of material
Activities: Check the stability, the dimension of the product
Activities.Def: The “Check the stability and the dimension of the product” activity must validate that the product perfectly fit with the specification

Process.Def: The “Packaging” process must allow the product to be obtained by the processing of material
Activities.Def: The “Package the product” activity must to pack the product for transport or sale

Process.Def: The “Packaging” process must allow the product to be obtained by the processing of material
Activities: Check the conformity of the product
Activities.Def: The “Check the conformity of the product” activity must validate that the packaged product fit with the specification

Process.Def: The “Packaging” process must allow the product to be obtained by the processing of material
Activities.Def: The “Label the product” activity must give product information to the user

Process.Def: The “Packaging” process must allow the product to be obtained by the processing of material
Activities.Def: The “Transport products to shipping are” activity must allow the transfer of a product/component from one place to another

Process.Def: The “Handling” process must allow the manual or mechanical movement of the product for storage, shipment or sale in a same place
Activities.Def: The “Ship products” activity must characterize the movement of the product from one location to another in a same place.

Process.Def: The “Handling” process must allow the manual or mechanical movement of the product for storage, shipment or sale in a same place
Activities: Sort and distribute products according to the indication
Activities.Def: The “Sort and distribute products according to the indication” activity must allow for the transfer of products to the right place within a same location

Process.Def: The “Handling” process must allow the manual or mechanical movement of the product for storage, shipment or sale in a same place
Activities: Move the product to the storage area
Activities.Def: The “Move the product to the storage area” activity must allow to transfer the product to store it before using, transporting or selling

Process.Def: The “Handling” process must allow the manual or mechanical movement of the product for storage, shipment or sale in a same place
Activities.Def: The “Unload products” activity must allow the remove of product into a vehicle to store it before using, transporting or selling

Process.Def: The “Transport” process must allow the transfer of product from a place to another by respecting environmental, social and economic constraints
Activities: Define a route according to delivery instructions
Activities.Def: The “Define a route according to delivery instructions” activity must determine the route taken by vehicles to deliver a product to a specific location by respecting environmental, social and economic constraints

Process.Def: The “Transport” process must allow the transfer of product from a place to another by respecting environmental, social and economic constraints
Activities: Organize the transfer and delivery of the product
Activities.Def: The “Organize the transfer and delivery the product” activity must move and deliver a product from one place to another by respecting environmental, social and economic constraints

Process.Def: The “Sales” process must allow the acquisition of the property and its change of ownership
Activities.Def: The “Receive the product” activity must characterize the possession of the product by a payment

Process.Def: The “Sales” process must allow the acquisition of the property and its change of ownership
Activities: Check the conformity of the product
Activities.Def: The “Check the conformity of the product” activity must validate that the product fits with the specification

Process.Def: The “Sales” process must allow the acquisition of the property and its change of ownership
Activities.Def: The “Store the product” activity must allow the product to be retained pending payment

Process.Def: The “Sales” process must allow the acquisition of the property and its change of ownership
Activities.Def: The “Receive the payment” activity must allow the change of ownership through monetary exchange

Process.Def: The “Order preparation” process must inform the supplier of the raw material requirements
Activities: Pick materials according to the order preparation instructions
Activities.Def: The “Pick materials” activity must extract raw material according to the order preparation instructions (quantity, type…)

Process.Def: The “Order preparation” process must inform the supplier of the raw material requirements
Activities.Def: The “Ship the package” activity must characterize the movement of the package from one location to another in a same place.

Process.Def: The “Order preparation” process must inform the supplier of the raw material requirements
Activities: Transport goods to the shipping areas
Activities.Def: The “Transport goods to the shipping areas” must allow the transfer of a product/component from one place to another

Process.Def: The “Order preparation” process must inform the supplier of the raw material requirements
Activities: Inform the order tracking and transmit a status of product
Activities.Def: The “Inform the order tracking and transmit a status of product” activity must notify the customer of the order progress

Process.Def: The “Assembly” process must to combine all the elements of the product to obtain the finished product
Activities.Def: The “Identify assembly operations” activity must describe the different assembly steps from the production instruction

Process.Def: The “Assembly” process must to combine all the elements of the product to obtain the finished product
Activities.Def: The “Position the part preliminary” activity must allow each part of the assembly to be positioned prior to attachment

Process.Def: The “Assembly” process must to combine all the elements of the product to obtain the finished product
Activities: Assembly and fix the elements in the order of assembly
Activities.Def: The “Assembly and fix the elements” activity must allow to obtain an assembly of the elements of the product by following the order of assembly

Process.Def: The “Assembly” process must to combine all the elements of the product to obtain the finished product
Activities.Def: The “Assembly the product” activity must allow to obtain the finished product

Process.Def: The “Assembly” process must to combine all the elements of the product to obtain the finished product
Activities: Check the conformity and make adjustments
Activities.Def: The “Check the conformity and make adjustments” activity must allow to correct defects in the finished product

Process.Def: The “Assembly” process must to combine all the elements of the product to obtain the finished product
Activities.Def: The “Carry out an activity follow up” activity must inform the user about the status of the product

Process.Def: The “Failure detection” process must allow to notice a problem with the product
Activities: Identify the defective part or components
Activities.Def: The “Identify the defective part of components” activity must allow to determine the cause of a problem in the use of the product

Process.Def: The “Failure detection” process must allow to notice a problem with the product
Activities.Def: The “Identify whether repair is feasible” activity must help the users to find a solution

Process.Def: The “Maintenance” process must allow the repair of the defective part
Activities: Identify the defective part or components
Activities.Def: The “Identify part or components” activity must validate the user’s diagnosis

Process.Def: The “Maintenance” process must allow the repair of the defective part
Activities.Def: The “Draw up an estimate” activity must inform the user about the reparation cost

Process.Def: The “Maintenance” process must allow the repair of the defective part
Activities.Def: The “Determine a response time” activity must inform the user about the response time

Process.Def: The “Maintenance” process must allow the repair of the defective part
Activities.Def: The “Define supply requirements” activity must determine the supply needs to make the reparation

Process.Def: The “Maintenance” process must allow the repair of the defective part
Activities: Replace or repair the defective part
Activities.Def: The “Replace or repair the defective part” activity must provide a solution of the user’s problem

Process.Def: The “Maintenance” process must allow the repair of the defective part
Activities: Check the operating status of the product
Activities.Def: The “Check the operating status of the product” must inform the user of the status of the product

Process.Def: The “Recycle” process must to find solution to reuse the product or its components, material
Activities: Identify the type of materials of the damaged parts
Activities.Def: The “Identify the type of materials of the damaged parts” activity must allow the material future

Process.Def: The “Recycle” process must to find solution to reuse the product or its components, material
Activities: Sort and direct defective parts to disposal area
Activities.Def: The “Sort and direct defective parts to disposal area” activity must to sort the non-recyclable part of the product towards the suitable area

Process.Def: The “Recycle” process must to find solution to reuse the product or its components, material
Activities: Sort and direct defective parts to recycle
Activities.Def: The “Sort and direct defective parts to recycle” activity must to sort the recyclable part of the product towards the suitable area
